slides.title: Welcome to GST Fundamentals
slides.content:
# GST Fundamentals

GST is India's **unified indirect tax** system.

## What You Will Learn

- **Structure** - Tax framework
- **Supply** - Taxable event
- **Levy** - Charge and collection
- **Value** - Transaction value

## Topics

| Area | Focus |
|------|-------|
| Introduction | Concept |
| Supply | Taxable event |
| Levy | Charge |
| Valuation | Transaction value |

slides.title: GST Structure
slides.content:
# Tax Framework

## Types of GST

| Tax | Applicability |
|-----|---------------|
| CGST | Central tax |
| SGST | State tax |
| IGST | Interstate |
| UTGST | Union territory |

## Rate Structure

| Rate | Examples |
|------|----------|
| 0% | Exempt/Nil |
| 5% | Essential items |
| 12% | Standard |
| 18% | General |
| 28% | Luxury/demerit |

## Dual Model

```
Intrastate: CGST + SGST
Interstate: IGST
```

slides.title: Concept of Supply
slides.content:
# Taxable Event

## Definition

```
Supply includes:
- Sale
- Transfer
- Barter
- Exchange
- License
- Rental
- Lease
- Disposal
```

## Requirements

| Element | Requirement |
|---------|-------------|
| By a person | Any person |
| For consideration | Value |
| In course of business | Furtherance |
| Taxable territory | India |

slides.title: Schedule I - Supply Without Consideration
slides.content:
# Deemed Supply

## Supply Without Consideration

| Item | Condition |
|------|----------|
| Related parties | Business |
| Distinct persons | Agents |
| Permanent transfer | Assets with ITC |
| Import of services | Related party |

## Principal-Agent

```
Supply when agent:
- Supplies on own account
- Or supplies for principal
```

slides.title: Schedule II - Activities as Goods or Services
slides.content:
# Classification

## Goods

| Activity | Deemed |
|----------|--------|
| Transfer of title | Goods |
| Works contract | Services |
| Lease of land | Services |
| IT software | Goods |

## Services

| Activity | Deemed |
|----------|--------|
| Construction | Services |
| Renting immovable | Services |
| Agreeing to act | Services |
| Composite supply | Classification rules |

slides.title: Composite and Mixed Supply
slides.content:
# Bundled Supplies

## Composite Supply

```
Two or more supplies:
- Naturally bundled
- In ordinary course
- One principal supply

Tax = Rate of principal supply
```

## Mixed Supply

```
Two or more supplies:
- Not naturally bundled
- Can be supplied separately

Tax = Highest rate among supplies
```

slides.title: Place of Supply - Goods
slides.content:
# Where Tax Applies

## Domestic Goods

| Scenario | Place |
|----------|-------|
| With movement | Destination |
| Without movement | Location at time |
| Bill to ship to | Third party location |

## Import/Export

| Type | Place |
|------|-------|
| Import | Importer location |
| Export | Outside India |

slides.title: Place of Supply - Services
slides.content:
# Service Location Rules

## B2B Services

| Rule | Place |
|------|-------|
| General | Recipient location |
| Immovable | Property location |
| Events | Event location |
| Transport | Destination |

## B2C Services

| Rule | Place |
|------|-------|
| General | Supplier location |
| Immovable | Property location |
| Events | Event location |

slides.title: Time of Supply
slides.content:
# When Tax is Payable

## Goods

```
Earlier of:
- Date of invoice
- Date of payment
- Last date to issue invoice
```

## Services

```
Earlier of:
- Date of invoice (if within 30 days)
- Date of payment
- Date service provided
```

## Reverse Charge

```
Date of payment or 60 days from invoice
```

slides.title: Value of Supply
slides.content:
# Transaction Value

## Inclusions

| Item | Include |
|------|--------|
| Price charged | Yes |
| Packing | Yes |
| Commission | Yes |
| Interest | Yes |
| Subsidies | Yes |

## Exclusions

| Item | Exclude |
|------|--------|
| Discount before supply | Yes |
| Post-supply discount (linked) | Yes |

slides.title: Exemptions
slides.content:
# Exempt Supplies

## Key Exemptions

| Category | Examples |
|----------|----------|
| Agriculture | Fresh produce |
| Education | Services by schools |
| Healthcare | Hospital services |
| Transport | Public transport |

## Zero-Rated

| Supply | Treatment |
|--------|----------|
| Export | Zero rate + ITC |
| SEZ | Zero rate + ITC |

slides.title: Levy and Collection
slides.content:
# Charging Section

## Section 9 CGST / Section 5 IGST

```
Tax levied on:
- All intra-state supplies (CGST+SGST)
- All inter-state supplies (IGST)
- At rates specified
```

## Reverse Charge

| Scenario | Who Pays |
|----------|----------|
| Notified goods/services | Recipient |
| Import of services | Recipient |
| Unregistered supplier | Recipient (if notified) |
